headline: Tell HN: Apple rejecting cross platform apps (React Native, Flutter, Capacitor)
description:
...Not on purpose, probably. This started immediately after their WWDC service downtime.

"Dear Developer,

We identified one or more issues with a recent delivery for your app, "App" 1.0.0 (2). Please correct the following issues, then upload again.

ITMS-90338: Non-public API usage - The app references non-public selectors in App: authorizationCode, createRequest, estimatedProgress, identityToken, initWithFrame:configuration:, isMainFrame, isPassthrough, navigationType, onSuccess:, removeValuesForKeys:completion:, setNavigationDelegate:, setProcessPool:, setRequestedOperation:, setRequestedScopes:, targetFrame, userContentController, viewManager, websiteDataStore. If method names in your source code match the private Apple APIs listed above, altering your method names will help prevent this app from being flagged in future submissions. In addition, note that one or more of the above APIs may be located in a static library that was included with your app. If so, they must be removed. For further information, visit the Technical Support Information at http://developer.apple.com/support/technical/

Best regards,

The App Store Team"

https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/31507

https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/105471

https://github.com/ionic-team/capacitor/issues/5661

https://developer.apple.com/forums/thread/127678
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：苹果拒绝跨平台应用（React Native、Flutter、Capacitor）。
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：蘋果拒絕跨平臺應用（React Native、Flutter、Capacitor）。
description_zh-Hans:
...不是故意的，可能。这是在他们的WWDC服务停机后立即开始的。

"亲爱的开发者，

我们发现你的应用程序最近的交付有一个或多个问题，"App" 1.0.0 (2)。请纠正以下问题，然后再次上传。

ITMS-90338。非公开的API使用--该应用在App中引用了非公开的选择器：authorizationCode、createRequest、improvedProgress、identityToken、initWithFrame:configuration:、isMainFrame、isPassthrough、navigationType、onSuccess。 , removeValuesForKeys:完成：, setNavigationDelegate:, setProcessPool:, setRequestedOperation:, setRequestedScopes:, targetFrame, userContentController, viewManager, websiteDataStore. 如果你的源代码中的方法名称与上面列出的苹果私有API相匹配，改变你的方法名称将有助于防止这个应用程序在未来的提交中被标记出来。此外，请注意，上述API中的一个或多个可能位于你的应用程序中包含的静态库中。如果是这样，它们必须被删除。欲了解更多信息，请访问技术支持信息：http://developer.apple.com/support/technical/

Best regards,

The App Store Team"

https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/31507

https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/105471

https://github.com/ionic-team/capacitor/issues/5661

https://developer.apple.com/forums/thread/127678
description_zh-Hant:
...不是故意的，可能。這是在他們的WWDC服務停機後立即開始的。

"親愛的開發者，

我們發現你的應用程序最近的交付有一個或多個問題，"App" 1.0.0 (2)。請糾正以下問題，然後再次上傳。

ITMS-90338。非公開的API使用--該應用在App中引用了非公開的選擇器：authorizationCode、createRequest、improvedProgress、identityToken、initWithFrame:configuration:、isMainFrame、isPassthrough、navigationType、onSuccess。 , removeValuesForKeys:完成：, setNavigationDelegate:, setProcessPool:, setRequestedOperation:, setRequestedScopes:, targetFrame, userContentController, viewManager, websiteDataStore. 如果你的源代碼中的方法名稱與上面列出的蘋果私有API相匹配，改變你的方法名稱將有助於防止這個應用程序在未來的提交中被標記出來。此外，請注意，上述API中的一個或多個可能位於你的應用程序中包含的靜態庫中。如果是這樣，它們必須被刪除。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問技術支持信息：http://developer.apple.com/support/technical/

Best regards,

The App Store Team"

https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/31507

https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/105471

https://github.com/ionic-team/capacitor/issues/5661

https://developer.apple.com/forums/thread/127678
